Title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
Writer: Steven Knight (screenplay by), Richard C. Morais (novel)
Actors: Helen Mirren, Om Puri, Manish Dayal, Charlotte Le Bon
Plot: The Kadam family leaves India for France where they open a restaurant directly across the road from Madame Mallory's Michelin-starred eatery.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 3 nominations.
